course_title: Fresh Sem: Psychology: The Science of Study
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 12 / Seats Avail: 0Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
(Freshmen Only) - You must have permission to enroll in-person.


Class meets in-person on Thursdays 9:40-10:55 only.  Class materials will be delivered asynchronous during the week.
course_description: Small class experience on topics of current psychological interest that fosters a highly interactive and mutually collaborative learning environment involving freshmen and faculty members. Topics include clinical, neuroscience, animal behavior, social, development and cognition.
schedule_location: TTh 9:40am-10:55am in New Psyc Bldg 250 (36 Eagle Ro
